content: designed for a self-striping yarn this simple sock pattern uses a picot hem as an alternative to the traditional ribbed cuff >***have you cast on this pattern *** we love to see your projects tag your photos on instagram with **#mysweetpaprikaproject** to enter our monthly giveaway for a chance to win a **$25 gift card** for www sweetpaprikadesigns com 1 see details here 2 **size** women s medium **finished measurements** circumference 7½ **yarn** 375 yds fingering weight shown in sweet paprika vivace discontinued 2 skeins flamingo **needles** size 2 2 75mm set of double-pointed needles **notions** yarn needle **gauge** 16 sts and 22 rnds = 2 5cm in st st worked in the round 1 https //www sweetpaprikadesigns com utm_source=ravelry&utm_medium=pattern&utm_campaign=monthly_giveaway 2 https //bit ly/space-iggivaway
